item.title: leetcode 209. Minimum Size Subarray Sum (尺取法)
item.description: Given an array of n positive integers and a positive integer s, find the minimal length of a contiguous subarray of which the sum ≥ s. If there isn’t one, return 0 instead. For example, given the array [2,3,1,2,4,3] and s = 7, the subarray [4,3] has the minimal length under the problem constraint 思路：尺取即可。。好久没写，竟然

item.title: codeforces 220 E. Little Elephant and Inversions (树状数组+尺取)

item.title: poj 3320 Jessica's Reading Problem (尺取法)
item.description: Jessica’s Reading Problem **Time Limit:** 1000MS **Memory Limit:** 65536K **Total Submissions:** 8787 **Accepted:** 2824 Description Jessica’s a very lovely girl wooed by lots of boys. Recently she has a problem. The final exam is coming, yet she has spent little time on it. If she wants to pass it, she has to master all ideas included in a very thick text book.
